My responsibilities included:

  1. Catering Operations Management:

    • Act as the primary point of contact for clients, understanding their needs and preferences.
    • Collaborate with clients to create customized catering menus and event proposals.
  3. Team Leadership:
    • Recruit, train, and supervise catering staff, including chefs, servers, and event coordinators.
    • Foster a positive and collaborative work environment, promoting teamwork and professional development.
    • Conduct performance evaluations and provide constructive feedback to team members.
  4. Business Development:
    • Identify opportunities for business growth and expansion in the catering market.
    • Build and maintain relationships with clients, vendors, and industry partners to drive new business and repeat bookings.
    • Participate in marketing and promotional activities to increase brand awareness and market presence.
